      • getAllStatements

        public static java.util.List<org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Statement> getAllStatements(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model model,
                                                                   org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.node.Resource resource)
        Resturn all Statements of a Resource in a given Model.
        Parameters:
        model - The model where the statements should be retrieved.
        resource - Resource that should be the subject of the statements.
        Returns:
        An (unmodifiable) list of all statements with the resource as subject.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if model or resource are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if model is not open

        Create a RDF2Go URI with the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - Value fro the URI
        Returns:
        A RDF2Go URI from value
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if value was null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if value is no valid URI
